ptolemy.homer.widgets

Class PortablePlaceableWidget

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.api.visual.widget.Widget
      • ptolemy.homer.widgets.NamedObjectWidget
        • ptolemy.homer.widgets.GlassPaneWidget
          • ptolemy.homer.widgets.PortablePlaceableWidget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.accessibility.Accessible, MinSizeInterface, NamedObjectWidgetInterface

    public class PortablePlaceableWidget
extends GlassPaneWidget
implements MinSizeInterface
    The widget visualizes only named objects that implement PortablePlaceable interface. It requests the named object to place itself into a provided container. The container is then covered with glass pane in order to prevent event propagation.
    Since:
    Ptolemy II 10.0
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Anar Huseynov
    Accepted Rating:
    Red (ahuseyno)
    Proposed Rating:
    Red (ahuseyno)
